item.description:
### **Objective**

The main goal of this collection is to setup and deploy the pipelines on new and old(if OOTB pipelines not deployed) NS.

### Environment Variable Setup

Use **OOTP Pipeline** prefix environment variable and update required details, listed below

- Environment setup
    
    - baseURL
        
    - apiKey
        
    - ns
        
    - ns1
        
- For Login you have to define below variables,
    
    - userName
        

### Training Configuration

To update Training Interval every Day/Row count in pipline, you need to update the below values to env variable

- setRowCount : true(if you want to set the row count) OR false(if you want to set day count)
    
- numDay: 7 (After how many days you want to train the model)
    
- rowCount: 10 (After how many row counts you want to train the model)

item.description:
## Objective This collection is mainly used to validate the pipeline triggered or not along with feature data validation. In this we have used the reusable methods call framework, by using this we can do n number of testcases or faetures verification. ## Test Cases The listed TC's are identical for both the pipelines(Desktop and MobileWeb) Sub testcases covered the pipeline triggering and feature data verification | Test Case | Sub testcase | | --- | --- | | Perform no purchase after 5 clicks for anonymous user | Verify Pipeline triggered or not
Verify profileId
Verify sessionId
Verify pScore
Verify model_version
Verify eventVector
Verify outcome | | Perform purchase after 5 clicks for anonymous user | Verify Pipeline triggered or not
Verify profileId
Verify sessionId
Verify pScore
Verify model_version
Verify eventVector
Verify outcome | | Perform purchase on 5th click for known user | Verify Pipeline triggered or not
Verify profileId
Verify sessionId
Verify pScore
Verify model_version
Verify eventVector
Verify outcome | | Perform purchase after 5 clicks for anonymous to known user | Verify Pipeline triggered or not
Verify profileId
Verify sessionId
Verify pScore
Verify model_version
Verify eventVector
Verify outcome | | Perform 5 clicks for return user(previous session) | Verify Pipeline triggered or not
Verify profileId
Verify sessionId
Verify pScore
Verify model_version
Verify eventVector
Verify outcome
Verify f002 feature(previous session event count) |
